title: DEMACIA
body: When will we see an update to garen one of the best staples top lane but is kinda weak mid game {{champion:86}}  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body: lol i think if he gets a buff he will be to op but something to help him lane would be nice sunfire cap is to expensive sometimes since it got nerfed and price increased

My screen size caused me to read this as "garen one of the best staples top lane but is kinda weak mid"

GAREN MID.
